meanings.definition: To give back money to someone who is not satisfied with a product or service.
meanings.sent1: The store refunded my money when the shirt I bought didn't fit.
meanings.sent2: I requested to be refunded for the broken toy I purchased.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy customer demanded to be refunded for the cold coffee.
meanings.sent4: She refunded the kindness by helping a stranger in need.
meanings.sent5: The company quickly refunded the overcharged amount to maintain customer trust.

meanings.definition: To repay or reimburse someone for an expense.
meanings.sent1: I will refund you for the gas you used to drive me to the airport.
meanings.sent2: The company refunded the employee for the business trip expenses.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly asked his friend to refund him for the borrowed pencil.
meanings.sent4: Her smile refunded his heart with warmth on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The kind gesture refunded her faith in humanity.
